entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this morning except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains late this morning and this afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow ending before morning then cloudy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Monday 8 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 4.
